visual.name: Acterys Matrix Gen 2 5.2.1.9
visual.description: The Acterys Matrix Gen 2 visual enables comprehensive write back & planning from Power BI and is part of the Acterys platform. An integrated solution for data warehouse automation, business modelling as well as planning & forecasting with connectivity to accounting platforms like Dynamics, SAP, Oracle, Xero, QuickBooks, etc.
